com.ucsf.core_phone.ui.widgets

Class AppScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.ucsf.core_phone.ui.widgets.AppScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppScreen, LoginActivity, NewProfileActivity

    public abstract class AppScreen
extends Activity
implements AppComponent
    Base activity for almost all the screens of the application.
